    • Constructor Detail

      • BigNumber

        public BigNumber(java.lang.String s)
        Constructor for class BigNumber. Transforms a string argument into an ArrayList of Integers. This assumes (as of current version) that the String contains only numbers and no characters.
        Parameters:
        s - : a String of numbers

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public BigNumber add(BigNumber bigN)
        Adds two BigNumbers together. Takes this BigNumber and a new BigNumber bigN, adds the individual numbers in each slot of the ArrayList starting with the least most significant digit, and puts the result into a new BigNumber result, which is then returned.
        Parameters:
        bigN - : BigNumber to be added to this BigNumber
        Returns:
        result : The resulting BigNumber of the addition of this BigNumber and bigN.

      • subtract

        public BigNumber subtract(BigNumber bigN)
        Subtracts two BigNumbers from each other. Uses the add(BigNumber bigindexN) function. Negates the parameter bigN before passing it through to add(bigN).
        Parameters:
        bigN - : BigNumber to be subtracted from this BigNumber.
        Returns:
        add(bigN) : the result of the subtraction

      • multiply

        public BigNumber multiply(BigNumber multiplier)
        Multiplies two BigNumbers together
        Parameters:
        mult - The number to multiply by
        Returns:
        the result of this BigNumber * the parameter

      • divide

        public BigNumber divide(BigNumber div)
        This method will return the quotient of this BigNumber and another in the format 'this'/bigN. The result is a BigNumber. In the case of 0 / (any BigNumber) or (any BigNumber) / 0, it returns 0. Uses tDivide(BigNumber bigN), a shared method with mod(BigNumber bigN), returning the first index of the array.
        Parameters:
        bigN - : The BigNumber to be divided by this.

      • mod

        public BigNumber mod(BigNumber div)
        This method will return the mod of this BigNumber and another in the format 'this' mod bigN. The result is a BigNumber. In the case of 0 mod (any BigNumber), it returns 0. This method does not handle any negative modding, so caution is advised when using this mod. Uses tDivide(BigNumber bigN), a shared method with divide(BigNumber bigN), returning the second index of the array.
        Parameters:
        bigN - : The BigNumber to be modded to this.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(BigNumber cmp)
        Compares the size of two BigNumbers Side effects: Both BigNumbers being compared will be normalized
        Parameters:
        cmp -
        Returns:
        -1 if parameter is smaller than this BigNumber, 1 if greater than, or 0 if equal

      • greaterThan

        public boolean greaterThan(BigNumber cmp)
        Used to determine if this BigNumber is greater than another
        Parameters:
        cmp -
        Returns:
        true if this BigNumber is greater than cmp

      • lessThan

        public boolean lessThan(BigNumber cmp)
        Used to determine if this BigNumber is less than another
        Parameters:
        cmp -
        Returns:
        true if this BigNumber is less than cmp

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the BigNumber in String format with the most significant number as the first in the string.
